ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_rainbow] Hello and A Question
ygData.msgSnippet: Hiya Rob! Well i play a wizard and have not noticed this phenomenon.  The ONLY thing I know of that can increase mana regen is a high level bard song, or an
ygData.messageBody:
Hiya Rob!

Well i play a wizard and have not noticed this phenomenon. The ONLY thing I
know of that can increase mana regen is a high level bard song, or an
encahter spell called "clarity". Nothing I know of decreases mana regen,
nor do I know of a stat that can increse it (besides meditate skill lvl).
If you do see it again, i would try to time it, maybe it is just your
perception during times when you need mana :) If you do see a quanitfiable
variance, i would report it as a bug.

-joe
----- Original Message -----
From: "Robert Coons" <robert.coons@...>
To: "EQ_rainbow" <EQ_rainbow@onelist.com>
Sent: Wednesday, March 15, 2000 8:44 AM
Subject: [EQ_rainbow] Hello and A Question


> From: Robert Coons <robert.coons@...>
>
> Hiya !
>
> I'm new to the list and wanted to say Hiya !
>
> I've got a pretty simple question - Sometimes when I'm meditating my mana
> bar raises pretty quickly and sometimes very very slow. What causes this ?
> Is there something that I can raise or do to make this faster. My skill
> level is around 100 in mediate - by the way...
>
> Anyone else on Mith Marr besides me ?????
>
> Thankies !
>
> Klek (Shaman Troll level 19 - Mith Marr)
>
>
>
>
